bs-insertlink-desc: Used in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=ExtensionInfo]], description of insert link extension
bs-insertlink-button-title: The title of the button that opens the dialog. It is shown on mouse over
bs-insertlink-dialog-title: The title of the dialog window
bs-insertlink-tab-wiki-page: The title of the tab containing the controls of a wiki page link
bs-insertlink-tab-ext-link: The title of the tab containing the controls of an external link
bs-insertlink-tab-email: The title of the tab containing the controls of an e-mail link
bs-insertlink-tab-ext-file: The title of the tab containing the controls of external filesystem link
bs-insertlink-label-page: The label of the page drop down field
bs-insertlink-label-link: The label of the link textfield
bs-insertlink-label-mail: The label of the mail textfield
bs-insertlink-label-description: The label of the description textfield
bs-insertlink-label-file: The label of the file input field
bs-insertlink-label-searchfile: The text of the search file button
bs-insertlink-select-a-page: The empty message for the page drop down field
bs-insertlink-select-a-namespace: The empty message for the namespace drop down field. Attention: this shows the mainspace lable as default
bs-insertlink-empty-field-text: The error message when the link field was empty.
